title: Thread deleted, posting revoked, for a "threat."
body:
Threat: "a statement of an intention to inflict pain, injury, damage, or other hostile action on someone in retribution for something done or not done."

I said that I hope that a meteor would fall on someone, not even anyone in particular.

Please, do the world a favor and buy a sense of humor, god knows Riot has enough money for that at this point.

Also... how is that a threat? Did I say "I am going to summon a meteor to smite you!" No I said "I hope a meteor falls on your house."

And you're going to report me to the authorities for hoping that a meteor falls on someone. HAHAHAHAHAHAHA!

Record that conversation, please. Oh I would so very much love to post that on my YouTube, holy crap it would probably go viral from the sheer level of absurdity. You'd probably end up on Timcast.

Tl;dr: I stated no intention, only a hope for a thing to happen. A very unrealistic thing, which any reasonable person would realize was not serious at all. TOO BAD THE WORLD ISN'T RUN BY REASONABLE PEOPLE ANYMORE AMIRITE?

I'll grant that "threats" is perhaps inaccurate. Unacceptable encouragement to self-harm and wishes of personal destruction? Yes. To quote you:

>I hope a meteor falls on your house, and destroys everything in it but you, and leaves you deaf, mute, and blind, and sends out an electromagnetic pulse that wipes your records from every system on the planet, so you can't communicate who you are to anyone, and there is no way for anyone to identify you, and you have no way to contribute anything meaningful to society anymore, so you become homeless, and spend the rest of your life filthy, miserable, and alone.

And the real icing on the cake:

>Please just go do something zero tolerance to yourself.

This is entirely unacceptable, and you're frankly lucky it was just a one-week ban.
